body:
I have tried building py-TensorFlow-2.5.0 with local spack changes. But, failing to build it with GCC-11.1.0 on all systems like- Intel and ARM. 

There are reported bugs for GCC-11 on dependant packages. explicitly including `<limits>` resolves some of the issues.
title: New version:  py-tensorflow-2.5.0  to be added
